results.content: Had some trouble setting up postgres interface on my computer.  It would be useful to have a copy of finished code available on GitHub so that a student could download it and configure the postgres database with a working copy of the code on their computer (I left my copy of finished course code on my GitHub site if it is helpful to other students).
